entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is described as making a nest for himself using assorted rags and smelly old blankets. He curls up in the middle of it to sleep every night.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is mentioned as being one of the people in a silver-framed family photograph that Kreacher had managed to retrieve. Harry witnessed her trial in Dumbledore's Pensieve.

relationships.description: Kreacher retrieved a silver-framed family photograph that included Bellatrix Lestrange, whom Harry had witnessed being tried in Dumbledore's Pensieve.
